article.name: Regarding the monitoring of IDCF Cloud environments (ILB, Virtual Router, RDB)
article.title: Regarding the monitoring of IDCF Cloud environments (ILB, Virtual Router, RDB)
article.body:
Mackerel does support the monitoring of IDCF Cloud environments, however the integration of the following IDCF Cloud managed services is implemented in a way that is unique to IDCF Cloud.

  • Infinite LB (ILB)
  • Virtual Router
  • Managed Relational Database (RDB)

For this reason, please contact the IDCF Cloud Support regarding inquiries related to the monitoring of these services.
